TopicTitle: NASA Asteroid Redirect Mission Pack/0.23.5 Images: now with 100% more SLS

Articles.Content:
One image of the SLS and i will explode for the hype.

Agreed. Personally I am more interested in the new parts than the actual asteroids. I'd say it has been far too long since there have been really interesting rocket parts added.
Fingers crossed for a 3.75m Orion capsule and SLS to that scale.

Fingers crossed for a 3.75m Orion capsule and SLS to that scale.

Some roomier command modules sure would be nice.
ARMA had dlc packs in alpha. Is there any news on structural parts in the dlc?

One image of the SLS and i will explode for the hype.

They did briefly show the new SLS parts in the ARM video at SXSW. I'm waiting for Squad to upload the video already.

C7 is drafting up a recap of his experiences down there. There will be some photos made available, though I'm not clear at this time if they will be specifically from the panel. If you're looking for a peek at ARM, though. We've got something planned that should hopefully go out in the next day or two. Stay tuned.

EDIT: Just got the draft. Well two, actually. One for each major event. I'm waiting to see if something we're talking about today will happen or not. If it doesn't, you'll see one of the drafts today, followed by the other soon after. If it does, well, something tells me you won't mind it being delayed by another day if all plans pan out.

EDIT 2: Welp - plans didn't pan out, so enjoy Chad's recaps today and tomorrow. We will, however, have something more in the next few days. Hopefully by the start of next week at the latest.

EDIT 3: Chad's next recap moved to early next week. I've got something else of relative interest for tomorrow.

Oh no! It sounds like we almost got .24, then something happened.

Oh no! It sounds like we almost got .24, then something happened.

snort.

At least I hope that was a joke.

Oh no! It sounds like we almost got .24, then something happened.

Let's crush that one while we're ahead. No, you didn't almost get 0.24
I wonder if Squad even hoped to create something with NASA when they created KSP! Man, you've all come a long long way, congratulations to all of you.
Any word on whether we'll get to see any pictures of the SLS parts in either of these drafts, Rowsdower?
That much I do not know yet, CalculusWarrior.
Rowsdower: Hype Machine

let's crush that one while we're ahead. No, you didn't almost get 0.24

we almost got 0.25???!

They did briefly show the new SLS parts in the ARM video at SXSW. I'm waiting for Squad to upload the video already.

One question: how it was?

One question: how it was?

Vaguely rocket-shaped.

......

Looking at the pictures of the SXSW stage screen. To me it appears that the attachment part 'grappler' is a docking port type thing. I can't see any arm type thing. Anyone agree or have other assessment/interpretation of these three pictures of the ARM ship and asteroid?
Any new pitchers gone out? Would love to see those new parts shown off. *drool*
No just the claw pictures. Non of the sls images have been released

Looking at the pictures of the SXSW stage screen. To me it appears that the attachment part 'grappler' is a docking port type thing. I can't see any arm type thing. Anyone agree or have other assessment/interpretation of these three pictures of the ARM ship and asteroid?

Yes it looks like an docking port. My guess is that its an port who sticks to anything like much of the KAS stuff but give an connection as stiff as an docking port.

I see the main issue as getting the ship docked trough the asteroid center of mass both contact point and orientation would be critical here.

Should be possible to send an kerbal to mark the target with an flag or something.

No just the claw pictures. Non of the sls images have been released

Sadness. Ah well. Fingers crossed for a surprise release on one of these Tuesdays coming up in the near future.

After seeing some threads and reactions to SQUADs FAQ blog entry here on the forums, i wouldnt post more than "something cool with NASA and asteroids is coming up" anymore... But i cant wait any longer for sure
Updated with new images!
Anyone else feeling like the 3.75m parts don't quite have the "stock" feel to them? It's kinda hard to tell from just those images, but to me those tanks look just a bit off.

They could be early prototypes, which will be/have been cleaned up a little later (we don't know at what dev stage these pictures were taken).

Also, it is hard to tell, but are they 5 metres or 3 metres in diameter? They seem larger than the 3 m parts I've used in the past, but I could be mistaken.

Updated with new images!

Thank you! I don't like how these new parts look, though. I've seen many mods that look better. Here is my KSP screenshot taken long time ago:
